name: No Kilamari
description:
FULL POWER BUILD. NO REPAIRS NEEEDED FOR 100% SHIP POWER.  

 Flight section has lots of bugs and issues currently being worked on. Mostly looking for feedback on the repair section.

      To set the mouse: left click while in full-screen to restrict mouse to the game.    

        The Kilamari have arrived, it is your job to destroy their Planet-Cracker. Start up your ships armaments and thrusters. 

        **Startup different components of the ship IN THE ALLOTTED TIME to IMPROVE its OFFENSIVE and DEFENSIVE capabilities. When you are out of PREP TIME, or out of repair drones, your ship will automatically launch and you will have to attempt to survive the onslaught of enemies ATTACKING YOU while you attempt to destroy the enemy's ultimate weapon.

Currently in development.
